boardgame.description: Unfurl the banners of the Great Houses of Westeros! To secure power in the Seven Kingdoms and to ensure the survival of their lines, the Houses of Westeros each follow very different paths. Some forge strategic alliances, some create complex political intrigues, and still others use deceit and betrayal. But there is no more direct or lasting path to power than taking to the field of battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Battles of Westeros, two players recreate the military conflicts set in George R.R. Martin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s A Song of Ice and Fire series, taking part in battles directly from the books... or designing their own. In this epic board game of battlefield tactics, players control either House Stark, the wards of Winterfell who have called their hearty allies to defend their honor and lands, or House Lannister, an aggressive force funded by Casterly Rock_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s endless supply of gold._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battles of Westeros is played over one of several included scenarios, called battles. Each of these has a battle plan that dictates the formation of the map (called the battlefield), starting positions of each House_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s units, starting resources, special rules, and victory conditions for the game session. A battle is played over several rounds, with each round consisting of alternating player turns. The goals a player needs to accomplish to win a game of Battles of Westeros can vary (some battles require players to earn a certain number of victory points, while other battles require a player to take and hold strategic positions on the battlefield), but this collection of available scenarios, along with the ability to make your own exciting battles with the double-sided map board and over thirty map overlays, gives Battles of Westeros a wealth of replayability!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battles of Westeros also offers plenty of strategic complexity, resulting in a satisfying number of compelling choices in every game. For example, each player has a special randomized Leadership Deck, consisting of unique tactics and abilities; this deck will change based on the scenario being played and characters present. Is Jaime Lannister on the battlefield? If you draw the appropriate Leadership Card, he can order nearby troops to aggressively rush their opponents! Is Eddard Stark guiding his forces into battle? Special flanking maneuvers enter your Leadership Deck, to potentially be drawn into your hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Battles of Westeros also features a level of realism that immerses you in the most significant conflicts of the War of the Five Kings. Each plastic figure base, which holds your infantry, archer, cavalry, and kennelmaster units, has a slot for a banner pole _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a small flag-bearing attachment. The plastic banners that attach to each unit bear the crest of that unit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s house, and their orientation on the pole indicates at a glance whether that unit has been ordered yet. In addition to the intuitive and useful game effect this provides (differentiating the units you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ve activated from those you haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t), the sight of your army_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s banners spread impressively across the gorgeously designed game board will give you the sense that you are the clever Tywin Lannister, Lord of Casterly Rock... or the stoic Robb Stark, with his direwolf Grey Wind at his side!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. BATTLELORE - BATTLE OF WESTEROS: $62.14 Fantasy Flight Games Availability: ** PRE-ORDER ** - Game not yet released or awaiting reprint SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country. We charge actual shipping cost and there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! Multiple games can be combined in a single shipment to save you money. Shipping methods: US Orders: USPS from zipcode 98230. Canadian Orders: Canada Post from postal code V3S 1C7. International Orders: USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Interac Money Transfer (Canadian bank account holders only) 3) Credit Card - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (processed by PayPal) 4) COD for local pickups in greater Vancouver (BC) area. A pre-paid deposit is required for local pick-ups. Deposit is credited to your bill when you pick up your games. 5) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com
Domestic Shipping: UPS GROUND with INSURANCE = $13.99

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG BW01) Unfurl the banners of the Great Houses of Westeros! To secure power in the Seven Kingdoms and to ensure the survival of their lines, the Houses of Westeros each follow very different paths. Some forge strategic alliances, some create complex political intrigues, and still others use deceit and betrayal. But there is no more direct or lasting path to power than taking to the field of battle. In Battles of Westeros, two players recreate the military conflicts set in George R.R. Martin’s A Song of Ice and Fire series, taking part in battles directly from the books... or designing their own. In this epic board game of battlefield tactics, players control either House Stark, the wards of Winterfell who have called their hearty allies to defend their honor and lands, or House Lannister, an aggressive force funded by Casterly Rock’s endless supply of gold.
It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s heavy!!! Uk Courier £7.99 Other countries on request
Domestic Shipping: UPS GROUND with INSURANCE = $13.99

New in Shrink. £5.50 first class postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (800 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.
English game.

Kind Regards, Dante

Very good copy of Battles of Westeros, only played 2-3 times. Includes extra Plano box for most-used components. Most components are like-new, but there is light wear on a few minis (unavoidable due to how this game is packaged. See forums for more reports of this). Shipping is $15 to continental US. Payment via Venmo preferred ($1 discount when paying via Venmo). Paypal is also accepted. PLEASE CLICK ON MY USERNAME TO SEE MY OTHER SALES - I COMBINE SHIPPING AT 5.00 PER EXTRA GAME. You can also pick up in Chicago at no cost! I sell exclusively through BGG, so buying from me always goes back to the site. I always have the lowest price for my edition and condition. Feel free to ask any questions!

*** Available for pickup at Origins 2014 – Open to offers *** Condition: Game removed from shrink wrap but contents unopened and unplayed. Box shows no shelf wear and is near mint condition. Game comes from a smoke free and pet free home. Pickup Options (no shipping costs): 1. Going to Origins 2014? I will be there from Thursday till Sunday and would be happy to bring the game to you. 2. Game is located in Chantilly, VA, if you are in the local area we can arrange a time for pickup.
